headline: Parker Completes Curtis Instruments Acquisition
summary: Enhances Electrification Capabilities with Complementary TechnologiesCLEVELAND, Sept. 18, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Parker-Hannifin Corporation (NYSE:PH), the global leader in motion and control technologies, today announced that it has completed its previously announced transaction to acquire Curtis Instruments, Inc. from Rehlko, for approximately $1 billion in cash. Curtis designs and manufactures motor speed controllers, instrumentation, power conversion and input devices that complement Parke

raw.summary: Enhances Electrification Capabilities with Complementary TechnologiesCLEVELAND, Sept. 18, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Parker-Hannifin Corporation (NYSE:PH), the global leader in motion and control technologies, today announced that it has completed its previously announced transaction to acquire Curtis Instruments, Inc. from Rehlko, for approximately $1 billion in cash. Curtis designs and manufactures motor speed controllers, instrumentation, power conversion and input devices that complement Parke
